channel.title: The Joy School Curriculum Company
channel.description: Recent content on The Joy School Curriculum Company

item.title: Welcome to the Joy School Curriculum Company
item.description: Do you love to work with children? Would you like to make some extra money? Have you thought about starting your own preschool but haven’t quite known where to start? Would you like to enhance the curriculum at your existing preschool with the internationally-acclaimed Joy School Curriculum? Do you want to offer meaningful thematic units and fun music that teaches children social skills, values and pre-academic skills? If so, you’re in the right place!
